title: How to Perform the Healed and Sealed Magic Trick

steps.headline: Get a thumbtack or a needle (preferably an office thumbtack.
steps.description: They have the nifty handle on the end.

steps.headline: Find a a spot near the top of the can ( I recommend the "N" in nutrition Facts),Now press the thumbtack through the middle of the "N"
Let out about 1/3 of the soda from the can Lightly denting the sides.
Take a piece of computer stock paper(can be found at most Walmarts and office supply stores for real cheap)and color a square about 2x2in.
Cut out a shape that is about the same size and shape of the opening.
Slide it under the very bottom of the pop top tab(this will give the appearance of an open can.
Place the gimmicked can inside of a trash bin.
Wait for some participants to walk by, and call them over.
Rummage through the garbage to give it more of a random feel.
steps.description: Pull out the can form the trash bin.

steps.headline: Cover the hole with your thumb.
steps.description: By just slightly shaking your hand will causes the carbonation to expand and fill the can. Causing the dents in the can to pop out.shake it a little.

steps.headline: Rub the opening of the can (the paper) with your fingers.
steps.description: (If your fingers are a little bit damp, the paper top will adhere to your fingers. )rub the paper off and then finger palm it.

steps.headline: Allow paper to fall from finger palm to the ground.
Then all you have to do is open the can and pour out some of the soda.

tyn: A Black or Dark Brown Sharpie Marker
A glass to empty the soda
a towel to clean up any mess
text: Get a thumbtack or a needle (preferably an office thumbtack. They have the nifty handle on the end. Find a a spot near the top of the can ( I recommend the "N" in nutrition Facts),Now press the thumbtack through the middle of the "N"  Let out about 1/3 of the soda from the can Lightly denting the sides.  Take a piece of computer stock paper(can be found at most Walmarts and office supply stores for real cheap)and color a square about 2x2in.  Cut out a shape that is about the same size and shape of the opening.  Slide it under the very bottom of the pop top tab(this will give the appearance of an open can. Even up close about 2-3ft). Place the gimmicked can inside of a trash bin.  Wait for some participants to walk by, and call them over.  Rummage through the garbage to give it more of a random feel. Pull out the can form the trash bin. Cover the hole with your thumb. By just slightly shaking your hand will causes the carbonation to expand and fill the can. Causing the dents in the can to pop out.shake it a little. Rub the opening of the can (the paper) with your fingers. (If your fingers are a little bit damp, the paper top will adhere to your fingers. )rub the paper off and then finger palm it. Allow paper to fall from finger palm to the ground.  Then all you have to do is open the can and pour out some of the soda.
sentences: Get a thumbtack or a needle (preferably an office thumbtack.
They have the nifty handle on the end.

Find a a spot near the top of the can ( I recommend the "N" in nutrition Facts),Now press the thumbtack through the middle of the "N"  Let out about 1/3 of the soda from the can Lightly denting the sides.
Take a piece of computer stock paper(can be found at most Walmarts and office supply stores for real cheap)and color a square about 2x2in.
Cut out a shape that is about the same size and shape of the opening.
Slide it under the very bottom of the pop top tab(this will give the appearance of an open can.
Place the gimmicked can inside of a trash bin.
Wait for some participants to walk by, and call them over.
Rummage through the garbage to give it more of a random feel.
Pull out the can form the trash bin.
Cover the hole with your thumb.
By just slightly shaking your hand will causes the carbonation to expand and fill the can.
Causing the dents in the can to pop out.shake it a little.
Rub the opening of the can (the paper) with your fingers.
(If your fingers are a little bit damp, the paper top will adhere to your fingers.
)rub the paper off and then finger palm it.
Allow paper to fall from finger palm to the ground.
Then all you have to do is open the can and pour out some of the soda.
